libraryPanel.name: EVCC: Energien aufsummiert Ã¼ber die Zeit

targets.query: SELECT value FROM pvDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter  tz('$timezone')
SELECT value FROM gridDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter  tz('$timezone')
SELECT value * (-1) FROM homeDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter  tz('$timezone')
SELECT value * (-1) FROM loadpoint1DailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter  tz('$timezone')
SELECT value * (-1) FROM loadpoint2DailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter  tz('$timezone')
SELECT value * (-1) FROM feedInDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter  tz('$timezone')
SELECT sum("value") from pvDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT max("value") FROM "pvPower" WHERE $timeFilter and value < $peakPowerLimit GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)  tz('$timezone')
SELECT value FROM gridDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT value FROM loadpoint1DailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter  tz('$timezone')
SELECT value FROM loadpoint2DailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter  tz('$timezone')
SELECT value FROM homeDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter  tz('$timezone')
SELECT value FROM pvDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT value FROM feedInDailyEnergy WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT "value" FROM "batteryMaxSoc" WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
SELECT "value" FROM "batteryMinSoc" WHERE $timeFilter tz('$timezone')
